article.title: Trade Agreement Compliance Program Success Stories
article.summary: Learn how the trade agreement complaince program has helped companies overcome trade barriers.

source_agencies.source_agency: International Trade AdministrationEnforcement & ComplianceTrade Agreements Negotiations and Compliance

article.content:
Success Stories

A case success is declared when a goal that was set by a case team at the beginning of a case for removing a foreign government trade barrier on behalf of a company and/or an entire industry is achieved.

The Trade Agreements Compliance Program has helped hundreds of companies to overcome foreign trade barriers that threatened to prevent access of U.S. manufactured goods, services, or investment.

Below are a few illustrative examples:

Successes By RegionSuccesses By IndustrySuccesses By Posting Date
Successes By StateSuccesses By Issue

Watch our video about how the TAC Program helped a small business in California overcome a government procurement barrier in Chile.
